short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A breathtaking browser theme inspired by the cosmic majesty of a fiery celestial event

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The background showcases a stunning ring of glowing plasma surrounding a brilliant, luminous core, evoking the image of a black hole or a star's eruption. Perfect for space enthusiasts and those who appreciate dramatic, high-energy visuals, this theme transforms your browsing experience into a window to the universe's most awe-inspiring phenomena.

Key features:
- Beautiful universe background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
